meanings.sent1: The old coin was lusterless, with no sparkle left.
meanings.sent2: The lusterless sky signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The lusterless performance of the magician left the audience unimpressed.
meanings.sent4: Her lusterless eyes reflected a deep sadness within.
meanings.sent5: The lusterless diamond failed to catch the light, looking dull and unremarkable.

meanings.sent1: The lusterless party had no music or laughter.
meanings.sent2: His lusterless hair hung flat and lifeless.
meanings.sent3: The lusterless joke fell flat, receiving no laughs.
meanings.sent4: The lusterless garden seemed to lack any signs of life.
meanings.sent5: The lusterless conversation left everyone feeling bored and unenergized.
